sense.definition: on the subject of; concerning (as of communication, thoughts, information, fights, etc.)
sense.notes: X1 is a word of communication, competition, cognition/emotion, information, data containment (or a word such as '*thing' which stands in for this)

sense.definition: so as to affect, as in "do something about it"
indicating a focal point or region in space; partially, if not fully, encircling
